attributes.action: Abolish the Second Home Allowance paid to MPs now that it has become clear that many MPs do not or will not comply with the spirit of the allowance.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recent revelations has made it clear that many MPs have been taking advantage of the second home allowance to make a profit from the arrangements instead of using the scheme to ensure they are not out of pocket from being an MP.  In the circumstances we believe the allowance should be abolished immediately.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
